sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_va_web_client.CIAppseeConfigurationLoader</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>CIAppseeConfigurationLoader</name> <script><![CDATA[var CIAppseeConfigurationLoader = Class.create(); CIAppseeConfigurationLoader.prototype = { initialize: function() {},
/** * @function getCIAppId * * <app_name>Web Client</app_name> * <app_type>virtual_agent</app_type> * <channel>web</channel> * * @returns {string} appId - App sys_id of the CI Analaytics application registered with appsee */ getCIAppId: function() { return '9bff34a0879a111075f0b918dabb359e'; },
/** * @function getCIAppseeConfiguration * * @returns {string} configuration - Stringified object containing configurations of the CI Analaytics application registered in appsee */ getCIAppseeConfiguration: function() { return JSON.stringify(sn_ux_metrics.GlideUXMetricsConfiguration.getConfig(this.getCIAppId())); },
type: 'CIAppseeConfigurationLoader' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-22 09:07:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1db2695e874a1110db22bae5dabb35b4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CIAppseeConfigurationLoader</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Virtual Agent Web Client" source="sn_va_web_client">0d5bb8b9730303004ab2369f2ef6a737</sys_package> <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Virtual Agent Web Client">0d5bb8b9730303004ab2369f2ef6a737</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1db2695e874a1110db22bae5dabb35b4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-22 09:07:19</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
